body:
This code fails to compile on ppc64le with:

```shell

.............................

-- Could NOT find NNPACK (missing:  NNPACK_INCLUDE_DIR NNPACK_LIBRARY CPUINFO_LIBRARY PTHREADPOOL_LIBRARY)

-- Using python found in /home/nimbix/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/bin/python
CMake Error at src/ATen/cpu/cpuinfo/CMakeLists.txt:51 (MESSAGE):
  Unrecognized CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR = ppc64le


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/nimbix/pytorch/torch/lib/build/aten/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
```
